title: Plant Monster Girl Diary - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Shounen   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Death   Demon Lord   Depictions of Cruelty   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Goddesses   Healers   Heroes   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Magic   Monster Girls   Monsters   Nobles   Previous Life Talent   Reincarnated as a Monster   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   Saints   Special Abilities
author: MInase
description:
I was supposed to go to defeat the demon lord as a saint, but suddenly I was betrayed by a junior saint apprentice and the hero who was my fiancÃ©.

On the verge of death, I regained the memories of my previous life as a Japanese high school girl, but that was all. I was eaten alive by a flower monster without awakening any cheat abilities whatsoever in the end.

When I came back to my sense, I found myself have been reincarnated as a plant monster, Alraune. The upper half of my body that grows out of the flower crown is that of a human girl, but the lower half is that of a plant.

I want to take revenge on those who have betrayed me, but I can't even move because my roots are buried in the ground. If humans find me, I'll be exterminated as a monster, and as a former saint, I don't want anyone to know that I've become a monster.

I will just live my new life quietly as a plant while photosynthesizing, so please be kind and water me.>
